data.name: Azari, the Devourer
data.text: The most terrible of demons is loose!\nAnd VERY hungry.

data.name: Cultist S'thara
data.text: A silver tongue to accompany her silver daggers.

data.name: Doctor Sezavo
data.text: It’s good to give blood. But not to him. He’s not a real doctor.

data.name: Felrage
data.text: Increased stats.

data.name: Fleeting Soul
data.text: Discards at the end of your turn.

data.name: Glinda Crowskin
data.text: The leader of Hagatha’s dark cult hides behind her loyal minions.

data.name: Glinda's Call
data.text: Has Echo.

data.name: Grasp of Mal'Ganis
data.text: Mal'Ganis is granting +2/+2.

data.name: Groddo the Bogwarden
data.text: Dead emerge from the swamp. It's not a pleasant scent.

data.name: Infusion
data.text: +2 Health.

data.name: Master Summoner
data.text: Costs (0).

data.text: Attack increased.

data.name: Next Hero: Warlock Ench
data.text: Add Warlock cards to your deck.

data.name: Next Hero: Warlock Ench Copy
data.text: Add Warlock cards to your deck.

data.name: Plaguemaster Rancel
data.text: Dying to his touch is terrible. Living is even_worse.

data.name: Plaguemaster Rancel
data.text: Dying to his touch is terrible. Living is even_worse.

data.name: Power of the People
data.text: Increased Attack.

data.name: Power Overwhelming
data.text: This minion has +4/+4, but will die a horrible death at the end of the turn.

data.name: Ratcatcher Hannigul
data.text: Rats aren't always the most loyal pets.

data.name: Remembrance
data.text: +2/+2 each time this is discarded.

data.name: Shudderwock
data.text: [x]And 'lo in uffish\nthought he stood, crying\n"Battle" in the wood.

data.name: Shudderwock
data.text: [x]And 'lo in uffish\nthought he stood, crying\n"Battle" in the wood.

data.name: Well-Studied
data.text: +1/+1 from Void Analyst.

data.name: Xol the Unscathed
data.text: She's got her eyes on you. ALL of her eyes.

data.name: Bottled Madness
data.text: Replace your hand with random Demons.

data.name: Death Becomes
data.text: Summon monstrous demons and burn away the enemy's weapons

data.name: Demonfire
data.text: This Demon has +2/+2.

data.name: Forbidden Ritual
data.text: Spend all your Mana. Summon that many 1/1 Tentacles.
data.flavor: Actually, C'Thun gives his full support for this ritual.

data.name: Phasing Portal
data.text: Choose a minion.\nPut it on the bottom of your deck.

data.name: Sacrificial Pact
data.text: Destroy a Demon. Restore #5 Health to your hero.
data.flavor: This is the reason that Demons never really become friends with Warlocks.

data.name: Second Class: Warlock
data.text: Add Warlock cards to your deck.

data.name: Soulfire
data.text: [x]Deal $4 damage.\nDiscard a random card.

data.name: Warlock
data.text: Select Warlock as your next class.

data.name: Bite of the Blood-Queen
data.text: Turn a hero into a Vampire.

data.name: Blood Essence
data.text: Transform 2 random minions in your opponent's hand into spells.

data.name: Blood Imp
data.text: [x] Stealth. At the end of your \nturn, give another random\n friendly minion +1 Health.
data.flavor: Imps are content to hide and viciously taunt everyone nearby.

data.name: Corruption
data.text: Choose an enemy minion. At the start of your turn, destroy it.
data.flavor: It starts with stealing a pen from work, and before you know it, BOOOM!  Corrupted!

data.name: Dark Pact
data.text: Destroy a friendly minion. Restore #4 Health to your hero.
data.flavor: "Don't worry about the fine print. Just sign here."

data.name: Dark Possession
data.text: Deal $2 damage to a friendly character. Discover a Demon.
data.flavor: Wanted on three counts of gnomish possession.

data.name: Flame Imp
data.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to your hero.
data.flavor: Imps like being on fire.  They just do.

data.name: Kobold Librarian
data.text: Battlecry: Draw a card. Deal 2 damage to your_hero.
data.flavor: Kobolds sort books using a gooey decimal system.

data.name: Lakkari Sacrifice
data.text: [x]Quest: Discard 6 cards.\nReward: Nether Portal.
data.flavor: They asked, “And what must we give in return?” Gul’dan lowered his hood and answered: “Six… cards…”

data.name: Malchezaar's Imp
data.text: Whenever you discard a card, draw a card.
data.flavor: Malchezaar used to have an imp named Dobby working for him, but there was a tragic accident.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Spire, in One Night in Karazhan.

data.name: Mortal Coil
data.text: Deal $1 damage to a minion. If that kills it, draw a card.
data.flavor: If your spells look like horrifying skulls, let's be honest, you should get to draw some cards.

data.name: Possessed Villager
data.text: Deathrattle: Summon a 1/1 Shadowbeast.
data.flavor: It's like a pinata! A lame disgusting horrific pinata.

data.name: Power Overwhelming
data.text: Give a friendly minion +4/+4 until end of turn. Then, it dies. Horribly.
data.flavor: We cannot even describe how horrible the death is.  It's CRAZY bad!  Maybe worse than that.  Just don't do it.

data.name: Reliquary Seeker
data.text: Battlecry: If you have 6 other minions, gain +4/+4.
data.flavor: The Reliquary considers itself the equal of the League of Explorers.  The League of Explorers doesn't.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Uldaman, in the League of Explorers adventure.

data.name: Sanguine Reveler
data.text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion and gain_+2/+2.
data.flavor: Have some! This drink is to die for!

data.name: Soul Infusion
data.text: Give the\nleft-most minion in your hand +2/+2.
data.flavor: People called him a soulless monster. We're not sure this is better.

data.name: Soulfire
data.text: [x]Deal $4 damage.\nDiscard a random card.
data.flavor: Are you lighting a soul on fire? Or burning someone with your OWN soul? This seems like an important distinction.

data.name: The Soularium
data.text: Draw 3 cards.\nAt the end of your turn, discard them.
data.flavor: Worst field trip ever.

data.name: Voidwalker
data.text: Taunt
data.flavor: No relation to "The Voidsteppers", the popular Void-based dance troupe.

data.name: Witchwood Imp
data.text: [x]Stealth\nDeathrattle: Give a random\n friendly minion +2 Health.
data.flavor: This wood imp. Stop asking!

data.name: Worthless Imp
data.text: You are out of demons! At least there are always imps...

data.name: Bloodbloom
data.text: The next spell you cast this turn costs Health instead of Mana.
data.flavor: Help save mana.  Donate blood today!

data.name: Clutchmother Zavas
data.text: Whenever you discard this, give it +2/+2 and return it to your hand.
data.flavor: A bit of a snob: still refuses to drive anything with automatic transmission.

data.name: Corrupting Mist
data.text: Corrupt every minion. Destroy them at the start of your next turn.
data.flavor: The most terrifying of Un’goro magics is both silent… AND deadly.

data.name: Curse of Rafaam
data.text: Give your opponent a 'Cursed!' card.\nWhile they hold it, they take 2 damage on their turn.
data.flavor: This is what happens when Rafaam stubs his toe unexpectedly.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Hall of Explorers, in the League of Explorers adventure.

data.name: Curse of Weakness
data.text: Echo\nGive all enemy minions -2_Attack until your next_turn.
data.flavor: Warlocks refer to this as a "balance change."

data.name: Cursed!
data.text: While this is in your hand, take 2 damage at the start of your turn.

data.name: Dark Peddler
data.text: Battlecry: Discover a\n1-Cost card.
data.flavor: I'm offering you a bargain here!  This amazing vacuum cleaner for your soul!
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Temple of Orsis, in the League of Explorers adventure.

data.name: Darkbomb
data.text: Deal $3 damage.
data.flavor: If you're looking to make an "Emo" deck, this card is perfect!

data.name: Darkshire Librarian
data.text: Battlecry:\nDiscard a random card. Deathrattle:\nDraw a card.
data.flavor: Do NOT be late with your overdue fines.

data.name: Defile
data.text: Deal $1 damage to all minions. If any die, cast this again.
data.flavor: This spell was originally designed to help warlocks clean up their hard drives.

data.name: Demonfire
data.text: Deal $2 damage to a minion. If it’s a friendly Demon, give it +2/+2 instead.
data.flavor: Demonfire is like regular fire except for IT NEVER STOPS BURNING HELLLPPP

data.name: Demonfuse
data.text: Give a Demon +3/+3. Give your opponent a Mana Crystal.
data.flavor: Very dangerous when attached to a demonbomb.

data.name: Demonic Project
data.text: Each player transforms a random minion in their hand into a Demon.
data.flavor: Another group project where Jaraxxus doesn't do any work.

data.name: Drain Soul
data.text: Lifesteal\nDeal $2 damage\nto a minion.
data.flavor: Cleans even the toughest clogs with just a flick of the wrist!

data.name: Gnomeferatu
data.text: Battlecry: Remove\nthe top card of your opponent's deck.
data.flavor: She prefers the term "Glampire."

data.name: INFERNO!
data.text: Hero Power\nSummon a 6/6 Infernal.

data.name: Life Tap
data.text: Hero Power\nDraw a card and take $2_damage.

data.name: Life Tap
data.text: Hero Power\nDraw a card and take $2_damage.

data.name: Life Tap
data.text: Hero Power\nDraw a card and take $2_damage.

data.name: Mistress of Pain
data.text: Lifesteal
data.flavor: Her sister is the Mistress of Pane who sells windows and shower doors.

data.name: Renounce Darkness
data.text: Replace your Hero Power and Warlock cards with another class's. The cards cost (1) less.
data.flavor: SEE YA DARKNESS!

data.name: Soul Tap
data.text: Hero Power\nDraw a card.

data.name: Soul Tap
data.text: Hero Power\nDraw a card.

data.name: Soul Tap
data.text: Hero Power\nDraw a card.

data.name: Spirit Bomb
data.text: Deal $4 damage to a minion and your hero.
data.flavor: Might take a few episodes to power up.

data.name: Succubus
data.text: Battlecry: Discard a random card.
data.flavor: Warlocks have it pretty good.

data.name: Tiny Knight of Evil
data.text: Whenever you discard a card, gain +1/+1.
data.flavor: "No, no, no. I asked for a tiny JESTER of evil."

data.name: Void Analyst
data.text: Deathrattle: Give all Demons in your hand +1/+1.
data.flavor: Conclusion: Nothing there.

data.name: Vulgar Homunculus
data.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Deal 2 damage to your hero.
data.flavor: Fortunately he has an even number of fingers.

data.name: Wrathguard
data.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, also deal that amount to your hero.
data.flavor: After playing against 5 Annoy-O-Trons, any normal guard will become a Wrathguard.

data.name: Bloodfury Potion
data.text: [x]Give a minion +3 Attack.\nIf it's a Demon, also\ngive it +3 Health.
data.flavor: You know what really makes my blood boil? The skyrocketing price of Bloodfury potions!

data.name: Chittering Tunneler
data.text: Battlecry: Discover a spell. Deal damage to your hero equal to its Cost.
data.flavor: Ear to the ground, he carefully interpreted the chittering noises: “You wanna cast a spell? I wanna cast a spell!”

data.name: Darkshire Councilman
data.text: [x]After you summon a minion,\n gain +1 Attack.
data.flavor: Democracy in action!

data.name: Demonwrath
data.text: [x]Deal $2 damage to all\nminions except Demons.
data.flavor: Demons are not angry most of the time. You have to play this card in order to really bring it out of them.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Blackwing Lair, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

data.name: Doubling Imp
data.text: Battlecry: Summon a copy of this minion.
data.flavor: What's worse than finding two imps in your lab? Only finding one of them.

data.name: Drain Life
data.text: Deal $2 damage. Restore #2 Health to your hero.
data.flavor: "I've just sucked one year of your life away."

data.name: Duskbat
data.text: Battlecry: If your hero took damage this turn, summon two 1/1 Bats.
data.flavor: Happily married with two kids. It was love at first bite.

data.name: Felguard
data.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Destroy one of your Mana Crystals.
data.flavor: Yes, he'll fight for you.  BUT HE'S NOT GOING TO LIKE IT.

data.name: Howlfiend
data.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, discard a_random card.
data.flavor: The problem is that he carries those cards in his mouth.

data.name: Imp Gang Boss
data.text: Whenever this minion takes damage, summon a 1/1 Imp.
data.flavor: His imp gang likes to sneak into Stormwind to spraypaint "Ragnaros Rulez" on the Mage Tower.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in Molten Core, in the Blackrock Mountain adventure.

data.name: Nethersoul Buster
data.text: Battlecry: Gain +1 Attack for each damage your hero has taken this turn.
data.flavor: Why did the demon cross the streams? To get to The Other Side.

data.name: Ratcatcher
data.text: Rush\nBattlecry: Destroy a friendly minion and gain its Attack and Health.
data.flavor: He's on the hunt for Togwaggle's missing rat.

data.name: Sense Demons
data.text: Draw 2 Demons\nfrom your deck.
data.flavor: Generally demons are pretty obvious and you don’t need a spell to sense them.

data.name: Shadow Bolt
data.text: Deal $4 damage\nto a minion.
data.flavor: It’s a Bolt.   It's made out of Shadow.   What more do you need to know!

data.name: Silverware Golem
data.text: If you discard this minion, summon it.
data.flavor: From the secret research labs of the Swiss Army.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Parlor, in One Night in Karazhan.

data.name: Soul Repressor
data.text: Deathrattle: Put the lowest Cost Demon from your hand into the battlefield.

data.name: Spreading Madness
data.text: Deal $9 damage randomly split among ALL characters.
data.flavor: Most citizens of Darkshire wear those surgical masks to prevent spreading Madness to tourists.

data.name: Treachery
data.text: Choose a friendly minion and give it to_your opponent.
data.flavor: Never look a gift minion in the mouth.

data.name: Unlicensed Apothecary
data.text: After you summon a minion, deal 5 damage to_your hero.
data.flavor: Get the ingredients wrong on ONE healing potion and they take your license. What a world!

data.name: Unwilling Sacrifice
data.text: Choose a friendly minion. Destroy it and a random enemy minion.
data.flavor: Stand right... there. Perfect, perfect! Now don't move.

data.name: Void Terror
data.text: [x]Battlecry: Destroy both\nadjacent minions and gain\n their Attack and Health.
data.flavor: If you put this into your deck, you WILL lose the trust of your other minions.

data.name: Amethyst Spellstone
data.text: Lifesteal. Deal $5 damage to a minion. (Take damage from your cards to upgrade.)

data.name: Blastcrystal Potion
data.text: Destroy a minion and one of your Mana Crystals.
data.flavor: There's a fine line between "potion" and "grenade". Wait. Actually, there's not.

data.name: Blood Witch
data.text: At the start of your turn, deal 1 damage to your_hero.
data.flavor: Like a sloppy joe for vampires.

data.name: Cataclysm
data.text: Destroy all minions. Discard your hand.
data.flavor: RUN FROM SKY CANDLES! THEY BURN! RUN!

data.name: Crystalweaver
data.text: Battlecry: Give your Demons +1/+1.
data.flavor: The trick is soaking the crystals in warm milk to soften them up.

data.name: Dreadsteed
data.text: Deathrattle: At the end\n of the turn, summon a Dreadsteed.
data.flavor: Crescendo himself summoned this steed, riding it to victory in the Grand Tournament.  Wherever he rides, an army of riders ride behind him, supporting the legendary champion.

data.name: Fel Cannon
data.text: At the end of your turn, deal 2 damage to a non-Mech minion.
data.flavor: The box says, "New and improved, with 200% more fel!"

data.name: Fiendish Circle
data.text: [x]Summon four 1/1 Imps.
data.flavor: Like a knitting circle, but less evil.

data.name: Fist of Jaraxxus
data.text: When you play or discard this, deal $4 damage to a random enemy.
data.flavor: * Not actually Jaraxxus' fist.

data.name: Grasp the Future
data.text: Draw 2 cards.\nThey cost (2) less.

data.name: Greater Amethyst Spellstone
data.text: Lifesteal. Deal $7 damage to a minion.

data.name: Hellfire
data.text: Deal $3 damage to ALL_characters.
data.flavor: It's spells like these that make it hard for Warlocks to get decent help.

data.name: Hooked Reaver
data.text: Battlecry: If you have 15 or_less Health, gain +3/+3_and Taunt.
data.flavor: The hook is just an accessory. He can reave just fine without it.

data.name: Imp-losion
data.text: Deal $2-$4 damage to a minion. Summon a 1/1 Imp for each damage dealt.
data.flavor: The shrapnel is waaaaay worse than the explosion.

data.name: Kil'rek
data.text: Taunt

data.name: Kil'rek
data.text: Taunt

data.name: Lakkari Felhound
data.text: Taunt\nBattlecry: Discard two random cards.
data.flavor: Guaranteed to track tar all over your carpet.

data.name: Lesser Amethyst Spellstone
data.text: Lifesteal. Deal $3 damage to a minion. (Take damage from your cards to upgrade.)
data.flavor:
A purple stone Azari carved
For dark hearts, craving, power-starved.
The first to bow, the warlock Rin,
Embraced the darkness, slew her kin.

data.name: Pit Lord
data.text: Battlecry: Deal 5 damage to your hero.
data.flavor: Mannoroth, Magtheridon, and Brutallus may be dead, but it turns out there are a LOT of pit lords.

data.name: Ravenous Pterrordax
data.text: Battlecry: Destroy a friendly minion to Adapt_twice.
data.flavor: For better results, feed your pterrordax low-fat, high-fiber minions.

data.name: Seadevil Stinger
data.text: [x]Battlecry: The next Murloc\nyou play this turn costs\n_Health instead of Mana.
data.flavor: Pretty harmless unless you're a Seadevil.

data.name: Shadowflame
data.text: Destroy a friendly minion and deal its Attack damage to all enemy minions.
data.flavor: Start with a powerful minion and stir in Shadowflame and you have a good time!

data.name: Summoning Portal
data.text: Your minions cost (2) less, but not less than (1).
data.flavor: NOT LESS THAN 1!  Don't get any ideas!

data.name: Voidcaller
data.text: Deathrattle: Put a random Demon from your hand into the battlefield.
data.flavor: "Void!  Here, void!  Here, buddy!"
data.howToGet: Unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in The Military Quarter, in the Naxxramas adventure.

data.name: Bane of Doom
data.text: Deal $2 damage to_a character. If that kills it, summon a random Demon.
data.flavor: My advice to you is to avoid Doom, if possible.

data.name: Blood-Queen Lana'thel
data.text: [x]Lifesteal Has +1 Attack for each card you've discarded this game.
data.flavor: As a young blood-princess she learned the proper way for a lady to curtsy, how to address fellow members of royalty, and how to bite them.

data.name: Deathweb Spider
data.text: Battlecry: If your hero\ntook damage this turn, gain Lifesteal.
data.flavor: The itsy bitsy spiders climbed up the village wall. Then came the witch and the spiders ate them all.

data.name: Demonheart
data.text: Deal $5 damage to a minion.  If it's a friendly Demon, give it +5/+5 instead.
data.flavor: Virtually every member of the pro demon lobby is a warlock. Weird.

data.name: Despicable Dreadlord
data.text: At the end of your turn, deal 1 damage to all enemy minions.
data.flavor: He's deathspicable.

data.name: Doomguard
data.text: Charge. Battlecry: Discard two random cards.
data.flavor: Summoning a doomguard is risky. Someone is going to die.

data.name: Feeding Time
data.text: Deal $3 damage to a minion. Summon three 1/1 Pterrordaxes.
data.flavor: True, they're only 1/1s, but they eat as much as most 4/4s!

data.name: Floating Watcher
data.text: Whenever your hero takes damage on your turn, gain +2/+2.
data.flavor: "Evil Eye Watcher of Doom" was the original name, but marketing felt it was a bit too aggressive.

data.name: Kara Kazham!
data.text: Summon a 1/1 Candle, 2/2 Broom, and 3/3 Teapot.
data.flavor: This is what happens when you tell Khadgar to set the table.
data.howToGet: Unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.
data.howToGetGold: Crafting unlocked in the Opera, in One Night in Karazhan.

data.name: Nether Portal
data.text: Open a permanent portal that summons 3/2 Imps.

data.name: Omega Agent
data.text: [x]Battlecry: If you have 10\nMana Crystals, summon\n_2 copies of this minion.
data.flavor: They don't just find the truth. They give it a ten second head start, then hunt it down.

data.name: Skull of the Man'ari
data.text: At the start of your turn, summon a Demon from your hand.
data.flavor: Don't trust the skull.

data.name: Tar Lurker
data.text: Taunt\nHas +3 Attack during your opponent's turn.
data.flavor: Hi, Tar here. Long time lurking, first time taunting…

data.name: The Final Seal
data.text: [x]Summon a 6/6 Demon.\nAdd 'Azari, the Devourer'\nto your hand.

data.name: The First Seal
data.text: Summon a 2/2 Demon. Add 'The Second Seal' to your hand.

data.name: The Fourth Seal
data.text: Summon a 5/5 Demon. Add 'The Final Seal'\nto your hand.

data.name: The Second Seal
data.text: Summon a 3/3 Demon. Add 'The Third Seal'\nto your hand.

data.name: The Third Seal
data.text: Summon a 4/4 Demon. Add 'The Fourth Seal' to your hand.

data.name: Usher of Souls
data.text: Whenever a friendly minion dies, give your C'Thun +1/+1\n(wherever it is).
data.flavor: Nothing unburdens your soul like a good ushing!

data.name: Anima Golem
data.text: At the end of each turn, destroy this minion if it's your only one.
data.flavor: The Dark Animus is evil and mysterious and huge and unable to write sentences that utilize proper grammar.

data.name: Cruel Dinomancer
data.text: [x]Deathrattle: Summon a\nrandom minion you\ndiscarded this game.
data.flavor: As that old saying goes: "you don't get into dinomancing to make friends."

data.name: Dark Bargain
data.text: Destroy 2 random enemy minions. Discard 2 random cards.
data.flavor: A prime example of lose-lose negotiating.

data.name: Dread Infernal
data.text: Battlecry: Deal 1 damage to ALL other characters.
data.flavor: "INFERNOOOOOOOOOO!" - Jaraxxus, Eredar Lord of the Burning Legion

data.name: Ectomancy
data.text: Summon copies of all Demons you control.
data.flavor: "Zerek! Stay out of my lab!"

data.name: Felfire Potion
data.text: Deal $5 damage to all characters.
data.flavor: Kazakus has a squad of imps bottling Felfire round-the-clock and he *still* can't keep up with demand.

data.name: Glinda Crowskin
data.text: Minions in your hand have_Echo.
data.flavor:
Summon an unlimited* number of minions!**


*Six
**Wisps

data.name: Kabal Trafficker
data.text: [x]At the end of your turn,\nadd a random Demon\nto your hand.
data.flavor: She ships illicit mana crystals around the world in packages marked: FUNNEL CAKE.

data.name: Possessed Lackey
data.text: Deathrattle: Recruit a_Demon.
data.flavor: If you don't keep up with your payments, it'll be a repossessed lackey.

data.name: Rin, the First Disciple
data.text: Taunt\nDeathrattle: Add 'The First Seal' to your hand.
data.flavor: Signed and sealed, she delivers oblivion.

data.name: Siphon Soul
data.text: Destroy a minion. Restore #3 Health to_your hero.
data.flavor: You probably should avoid siphoning your own soul.  You might create some kind of weird infinite loop.

data.name: Void Crusher
data.text: Inspire: Destroy a random minion for each player.
data.flavor: We like to call him "Wesley".

data.name: Wilfred Fizzlebang
data.text: Cards you draw from your Hero Power cost (0).
data.flavor: He can summon anything, even a FEARSOME DOOMGUARD*.\n\n*He's pretty sure this is going to work out.

data.name: Abyssal Enforcer
data.text: Battlecry: Deal 3 damage to all other characters.
data.flavor: The Kabal print this on every package of illicit Mana Crystals: WARNING - DO NOT PUT WITHIN REACH OF ABYSSALS. THIS IS NOT APPROVED FOR USE BY FLAMING DEMONS OF ANY KIND.

data.name: Cho'gall
data.text: Battlecry: The next spell you cast this turn costs Health instead of Mana.
data.flavor: Even after all this time, Gul'dan still makes Cho'gall go get donuts and coffee.

data.name: Fearsome Doomguard
data.flavor: They were originally called Cuddleguards, but they were not inspiring the proper amount of fear.

data.name: Lord Godfrey
data.text: [x]Battlecry: Deal 2 damage to\nall other minions. If any die,\nrepeat this Battlecry.
data.flavor: Betrayed the Alliance. Betrayed the Horde. All for 200 achievement points and a sweet, sweet hat.

data.name: Rift Warden
data.text: [x]Battlecry: Discard a \nrandom minion.\n Deathrattle: Summon it.

data.name: Dr. Morrigan
data.text: Deathrattle: Swap this with a minion from your deck.
data.flavor: She will NOT STOP until she gets tenure.

data.name: Twisting Nether
data.text: Destroy all minions.
data.flavor: The Twisting Nether is a formless place of magic and illusion and destroyed minions.

data.name: Twisting Nether?
data.text: This doesn't look like Twisting Nether...

data.name: Krul the Unshackled
data.text: [x]Battlecry: If your deck has\nno duplicates, summon all\n_Demons from your hand._
data.flavor: Spicklefizz pondered his life choices as he looked at the chain around his neck. "Become a warlock," they said. "You get to enslave demons," they said.

data.name: Lord Jaraxxus
data.text: Battlecry: Destroy your hero and replace it with Lord Jaraxxus.
data.flavor: "TRIFLING GNOME! YOUR ARROGANCE WILL BE YOUR UNDOING!!!!"

data.name: Mal'Ganis
data.text: Your other Demons have +2/+2.\nYour hero is Immune.
data.flavor: Mal'Ganis doesn't like being betrayed, so if you discard him, watch out.

data.name: Voidlord
data.text: [x]Taunt\n Deathrattle: Summon three\n1/3 Demons with Taunt.
data.flavor: Never let it hold your checkbook.

data.name: Azari, the Devourer
data.text: Battlecry: Destroy your opponent's deck.

data.name: Bloodreaver Gul'dan
data.text: Battlecry: Summon all friendly Demons that_died_this_game.

data.name: Bloodreaver Gul'dan
data.text: Battlecry: Summon all friendly Demons that_died_this_game.
data.flavor: "Still you refuse to bend your knee? None can escape death, you old fool. And in death… all will serve me…"

data.name: DOOM!
data.text: Destroy all minions. Draw a card for each.
data.flavor: We ran out of space for "DOOOOOOOOOOOM!!!!!"

data.name: Nether Portal
data.text: At the end of your turn, summon two 3/2 Imps.
